basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full Stack Developer with expertise in modern web technologies, trading systems, and distributed applications. Specialized in building high-performance financial applications and secure trading platforms.

work.name: Trading Dashboard Project
highlights: Developed a comprehensive crypto trading dashboard with real-time data integration from multiple exchanges (Bingx, Bitget, Phemex)
Implemented secure API key management with encryption for multiple exchange connections
Built a modular microservices architecture using Next.js and TypeScript
Created an advanced portfolio analytics system with real-time PnL tracking and performance metrics
Developed interactive data visualizations using Chart.js for trading metrics and portfolio analysis
Implemented secure user authentication and authorization with Supabase and MFA support
Built a real-time order management system with WebSocket integrations
Created a customizable dashboard with draggable metric cards and multiple chart types
Integrated wallet management features with cryptocurrency exchange APIs
Implemented automated historical data import and analysis features

work.name: IC DocuTrack Project
highlights: Developed a secure document tracking system on the Internet Computer platform
Implemented advanced encryption using VetKeys system for secure file sharing
Built a scalable multi-canister architecture for document management
Created a modern frontend using SvelteKit and TailwindCSS
Designed and implemented a hybrid encryption system combining symmetric keys with Identity-Based Encryption
Developed secure file sharing mechanisms with per-recipient key management
Implemented chunked file upload system for handling large files efficiently

projects.name: Trading Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive cryptocurrency trading and portfolio management platform with real-time data integration and advanced analytics
highlights: Real-time integration with multiple cryptocurrency exchanges
Advanced portfolio analytics and performance tracking
Interactive and customizable dashboard with draggable components
Secure API key management and encryption
Multi-factor authentication and OAuth integration
WebSocket-based real-time data updates
Historical data analysis and reporting
Cross-exchange order management

frontend_features: Responsive UI with TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui

projects.name: IC DocuTrack
projects.description: A secure document management system built on the Internet Computer platform with advanced encryption capabilities
highlights: Implemented end-to-end encryption using VetKeys system
Created a multi-canister architecture for scalable document storage
Developed user-friendly interface with SvelteKit and TailwindCSS
Integrated Internet Identity for secure authentication
Implemented hybrid encryption system for efficient large file handling
Designed secure file sharing with recipient-specific key management
Built chunked file upload system with progress tracking

encryption_features: Hybrid encryption combining symmetric keys with IBE
